name: WattsVision®
0:
”Alexa, set bathroom to 23 degrees”
”Alexa, what temperature is bathroom set to?”
”Alexa, switch on the living room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill manages the connected Watts Vision® plugs, lights and heaters with settings like room temperature, setpoint and the different modes of Watts Vision® devices installed in your home.


In order to control your Watts Vision® products, you need to create an account and pair your device with Watts Vision® app.
- Download and open Watts Vision® app on your smartphone, Android or IOS ;
- Create an account and login ;
- Pair your thermostats with "+" icons on main menu ;
- You will receive a "pass code" on your email account, your have to fill it in your smarthome device ;
- Your device is ready to pair with Alexa ;
- Activate the skill on Alexa app and login with the same credentials used in Watts Vision® app ;
- After login, Alexa App asks you if you want to search new devices, press yes.

Your devices will now appear as thermostat on Alexa app !
You will be able to configure them in a room and control them directly with your voice.
For example, ask current room temperature :
"Alexa, what is the temperature in my bathroom ?"

Watts Vision® gives you 3 different heating modes: AUTOMATIC, HEAT, OFF. You can set a mode with:
"Alexa, set bathroom to OFF"

You can also adjust thermostat setpoint :
"Alexa, set bathroom to 23 degrees"


You can also control your plugs or lights :
"Alexa, switch on the living room"

This skill is created to improve your experience with your connected products Watts Vision®. 
Let's control them with your voice !
